title: Is Putin an idea or a person? - Quora

response.answer_text: One of the best questions I have read on Quora. Many people want to think of Putin as an idea, like in the 50’s when they were chasing communist. Witch hunting, now instead of chasing communist the Democrats and the Left want you to think the evil Putin is everywhere. Rigging elections, dictating policy in the White House. It’s just a shame that people are so gullible.

Both. He is definitely a human being, but he is also the embodiment of the Russian centuries-old idea of a ‘good tsar’. In the broken-down heart of Siberia, Putin is still Russia’s ‘good tsar’ | Shaun Walker
